attributes.action: Follow Italy and Brussels decision to expel undesirable immigrants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Italy has decided to establish new laws making it easier to expel undesirable immigrants, with the backing of Brussels. The European Commission said the Italian government was within its rights to expel anyone suspected of being a "threat to public safety". Crime rates have risen so much in the UK that something needs to be done to stop this, and to get Britan back to being a safe and civilised nation.
